title: *STUNNING* LARGE RENOVATED - Parking and Back Yard
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 248626405', 'Rent: $3,685 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 08/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Rent Includes:: Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'VERY LARGE, Beautifully RENOVATED, OPEN LIVING SPACE, 2nd and 3rd floor of a meticulously maintained 2 family house on quiet tree lined street...', '4 Good sized bedrooms, Eat in kitchen ( with all new STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES) LARGE, OPEN LIVING ROOM & DINING ROOM w/ Decorative Fireplace, 2nd small Living room ( or large study) between the 2 3rd floor bedrooms...', 'There is a 5th BR (which is a renovated porch that is 7 feet wide by 26 feet long)', '3 minute drive to entrance to RT 93 ( into BOSTON or heading north), very close to Somerville/ Ball ( 10 minutes walk) sq & Davis Square ( 20 minutes walk), ***ENORMOUS FENCED YARD***, there is a driveway with 3 or 4 tandem parking spaces avail for rent or street parking is easy', 'Contact Chris to schedule your showings!', 'For inquiries..', 'Please email Chris with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!', 'ChrisP @ <URL>          860 - 309 - 8511', 'Bus: 80 Broadway @', 'Alfred St (0.52 mi)', 'Bus: 89 Broadway @', 'Alfred St (0.52 mi)', 'Bus: 101 Main St @ Mayberry Ave (0.25 mi)', 'Bus: 95 Mystic Ave @ Bonner Ave (0.08 mi)', 'Bus: 134 61 Locust St (0.52 mi)', 'Bus: 96', 'George St @ Main St (0.63 mi)', '248626405', 'Christopher Puzacke', 'Licensed Real Estate Professional', '107 Brighton Ave Boston, MA 02134', 'Cell: 860.309.8511', 'Click here to search all of our available apartments!', '<URL>/', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
